Are you available today at 2 PM London time for a remote session?

Hi Nick,

Thank you for your time on our call earlier.  As discussed on our call please do let me know when you have had the opportunity to test a Content Aware Protection policy and can confirm that new event logs are made under Content Aware Report on the EPP Server interface.

For the newly discovered SSH vulnerability, please open a new case with us and we will take this forward with high priority.


Kind regards

For the newly discovered SSH vulnerability, please open a new case with us and we will take this forward with high priority.
